channel.title: [317]Basillius
channel.description:
[img]http://localhostr.com/file/WSIs6TL/nother.png[/img]
[b]Our other projects were dead, so we started a new one. As baze we are using the Azure Source.[/b]
We will keep this updated!
[b]Developers:[/b]
[ul][li][b]I Roll Deep[/b][/li] [li][b]Daladubz[/b][/li][/ul] Updates:
[ul][li]Repackaged it[/li] [li]Started working on a Better Combat system[/li] [li]Added all Emotions[/li] [li]Added a Potion and Eating system[/li] [li]Fixed the Shortbow glitch[/li] [li]Added energy restoring[/li] [li]Started working on a action system[/li] [li]Added a Herblore system[/li] [li]Added leather crafting[/li] [li]Started working on Tanning hides[/li] [li]Fixed the Password login glitch[/li] [li]Fixed the level up bug[/li] [li]Started a Runecrafting base[/li][/ul] Pictures:
Runecrafting
[img]http://desmond.imageshack.us/Himg841/scaled.php?server=841&filename=rc1f.png&res=medium[/img]
[img]http://desmond.imageshack.us/Himg585/scaled.php?server=585&filename=hellomoparscape.png&res=medium[/img] Cleaning herbs [img]http://desmond.imageshack.us/Himg148/scaled.php?server=148&filename=herblorej.png&res=medium[/img] Making unfinished Pots [img]http://desmond.imageshack.us/Himg200/scaled.php?server=200&filename=makingunfpots.png&res=medium[/img]

item.title: [317]Basillius
item.dc:creator: @I_Roll_Deep I Roll Deep
item.description:
@I_Roll_Deep wrote:

[quote=“Daladubz, post:2, topic:412952”]Woo woo Hopefully this one dosen’t fail. Currently working on melee maxhit…

Heres a preview of the maxhit class. Still have a lot to add to it…

[code]package org.basilius.model.combat.melee;

import org.basilius.model.skills.prayer.Prayer;
import org.basilius.model.Player;

/**
*

  • Handles the melee max hits
  • @version 1.0
  • @author Daladubz

*/

public class MeleeMaxHit {

public static double calculateBaseDamage(Player player, boolean special) {
    double base = 0;
    double specialBonus = specialStrength(player);
    if (special)
        base = (base * specialBonus);
    return Math.floor(base);
}

public static int styleBonus(Player player) {
    //return player.combatStyles == 2 ? 3: combatStyles == 3 ? 1: combatStyles == 4 ? 3: 0;
    return 1;
}
        
/**
 * 
 * Handles the prayer bonus
 *  Added piety and chiv just incase we add later on?
 * 
 * @param player
 * 
 * @return 
 * 
 */
public static double prayerStrength(Player player) {
    double prayerMultiplier = 1;
    if (player.getIsUsingPrayer()[Prayer.BURST_OF_STRENGTH]) {
        prayerMultiplier = 1.05;
} else if (player.getIsUsingPrayer()[Prayer.SUPERHUMAN_STRENGTH]) {
        prayerMultiplier = 1.1;
} else if (player.getIsUsingPrayer()[Prayer.ULTIMATE_STRENGTH]) {
        prayerMultiplier = 1.15;
} else if (player.getIsUsingPrayer()[Prayer.CHIVALRY]) {
        prayerMultiplier = 1.18;
} else if (player.getIsUsingPrayer()[Prayer.PIETY]) {
        prayerMultiplier = 1.23;
}
    return 1;
}

/**
 * 
 * Gets what weapon is in weapon slot
 *  Then loads what special bonus it has
 * 
 * @param player
 * 
 * @return 
 * 
 */
public static double specialStrength(Player player) {
    for (double[] slot : special) {
        /**
         * TODO
         */
    }
    return 1;
}
        
public static final double[][] special = {
    { 5698, 1.1}, { 5680, 1.1}, 
{ 1231, 1.1}, { 1215, 1.1}, 
{ 3204, 1.1}, { 1305, 1.15}, 
{ 1434, 1.45},{ 11694, 1.34375},
{ 11696, 1.1825}, {11698, 1.075},
{ 11700, 1.075}, {861, 1.1}
};

}
[/code][/quote]
Keep it up

Read full topic

item.title: [317]Basillius
item.dc:creator: @Daladubz Daladubz
item.description:
@Daladubz wrote:

Woo woo Hopefully this one dosen’t fail. Currently working on melee maxhit…

Heres a preview of the maxhit class. Still have a lot to add to it…

[code]package org.basilius.model.combat.melee;

import org.basilius.model.skills.prayer.Prayer;
import org.basilius.model.Player;

/**
*

  • Handles the melee max hits
  • @version 1.0
  • @author Daladubz

*/

public class MeleeMaxHit {

public static double calculateBaseDamage(Player player, boolean special) {
    double base = 0;
    double specialBonus = specialStrength(player);
    if (special)
        base = (base * specialBonus);
    return Math.floor(base);
}

public static int styleBonus(Player player) {
    //return player.combatStyles == 2 ? 3: combatStyles == 3 ? 1: combatStyles == 4 ? 3: 0;
    return 1;
}
        
/**
 * 
 * Handles the prayer bonus
 *  Added piety and chiv just incase we add later on?
 * 
 * @param player
 * 
 * @return 
 * 
 */
public static double prayerStrength(Player player) {
    double prayerMultiplier = 1;
    if (player.getIsUsingPrayer()[Prayer.BURST_OF_STRENGTH]) {
        prayerMultiplier = 1.05;
} else if (player.getIsUsingPrayer()[Prayer.SUPERHUMAN_STRENGTH]) {
        prayerMultiplier = 1.1;
} else if (player.getIsUsingPrayer()[Prayer.ULTIMATE_STRENGTH]) {
        prayerMultiplier = 1.15;
} else if (player.getIsUsingPrayer()[Prayer.CHIVALRY]) {
        prayerMultiplier = 1.18;
} else if (player.getIsUsingPrayer()[Prayer.PIETY]) {
        prayerMultiplier = 1.23;
}
    return 1;
}

/**
 * 
 * Gets what weapon is in weapon slot
 *  Then loads what special bonus it has
 * 
 * @param player
 * 
 * @return 
 * 
 */
public static double specialStrength(Player player) {
    for (double[] slot : special) {
        /**
         * TODO
         */
    }
    return 1;
}
        
public static final double[][] special = {
    { 5698, 1.1}, { 5680, 1.1}, 
{ 1231, 1.1}, { 1215, 1.1}, 
{ 3204, 1.1}, { 1305, 1.15}, 
{ 1434, 1.45},{ 11694, 1.34375},
{ 11696, 1.1825}, {11698, 1.075},
{ 11700, 1.075}, {861, 1.1}
};

}
[/code]
